New Year's Day ‚Äî Now is the accepted time to make your regular annual good resolutions. Next week you can begin paving hell with them as usual. ‚Äî Mark Twain

I am a sentimentalist when it comes to New Year‚Äôs. Every year I make the same list: more reading, more exercise, more time for friends, more adult eating i.e. no fudge, no bacon, no beer. And every year, I tend to stray from the path of goodness and light fairly soon out of the gate. But this year will be different; I can just feel it.
